segment.source: Description: The Ad mediation report lets you see your effective fill rate and the respective fill rates for the ad networks you're using.
segment.target: Description: The Ad mediation report lets you see your effective fill rate and the respective fill rates for the ad networks you're using.

segment.source: title: Ad mediation report
segment.target: title: Ad mediation report

segment.source: ms.assetid: 18A33928-B9F2-4F76-9A9C-F01FEE42FEA1
segment.target: ms.assetid: 18A33928-B9F2-4F76-9A9C-F01FEE42FEA1

segment.source: Ad mediation report
segment.target: Ad mediation report

segment.source: The Ad mediation report lets you see your effective fill rate and the respective fill rates for the ad networks you're using.
segment.target: The Ad mediation report lets you see your effective fill rate and the respective fill rates for the ad networks you're using.

segment.source: It also shows the adoption rates of each of your mediation configurations and provides visibility into errors reported by ad networks and the mediator.
segment.target: It also shows the adoption rates of each of your mediation configurations and provides visibility into errors reported by ad networks and the mediator.

segment.source: You can view this data in your dashboard, or download the report to view offline.
segment.target: You can view this data in your dashboard, or download the report to view offline.

segment.source: Important The Ad mediation report only provides data if you are using Windows ad mediation in your app.
segment.target: Important The Ad mediation report only provides data if you are using Windows ad mediation in your app.

segment.source: Page filters
segment.target: Page filters

segment.source: Near the top of the page, you can expand Page filters to filter all of the data on this page by date range and/or by market.
segment.target: Near the top of the page, you can expand Page filters to filter all of the data on this page by date range and/or by market.

segment.source: Date: The default filter is Last 30 days, but you can expand this up to Last 12 months.
segment.target: Date: The default filter is Last 30 days, but you can expand this up to Last 12 months.

segment.source: Market: The default setting is All markets.
segment.target: Market: The default setting is All markets.

segment.source: You can choose a specific market if you want this page to only show ratings from customers in that market.
segment.target: You can choose a specific market if you want this page to only show ratings from customers in that market.

segment.source: Platform: The default setting is All platforms.
segment.target: Platform: The default setting is All platforms.

segment.source: If your app targets multiple platforms, you can choose a specific platform.
segment.target: If your app targets multiple platforms, you can choose a specific platform.

segment.source: The info in all of the charts listed below will reflect the period of time selected in Page filters.
segment.target: The info in all of the charts listed below will reflect the period of time selected in Page filters.

segment.source: By default this will include data from all of the markets and platforms in which your app is listed, unless you've used the Page filters to specify a specific market and/or platform.
segment.target: By default this will include data from all of the markets and platforms in which your app is listed, unless you've used the Page filters to specify a specific market and/or platform.

segment.source: Ad mediation performance
segment.target: Ad mediation performance

segment.source: The Ad mediation performance chart shows the average total fill rate over the selected period of time.
segment.target: The Ad mediation performance chart shows the average total fill rate over the selected period of time.

segment.source: This is the average fill rate across all user sessions, regardless of your mediation configuration or how often different ad networks were called.
segment.target: This is the average fill rate across all user sessions, regardless of your mediation configuration or how often different ad networks were called.

segment.source: You can click the Mediation requests heading to see the average number of individual mediation requests, or click Ads delivered to see the average total number of ads delivered.
segment.target: You can click the Mediation requests heading to see the average number of individual mediation requests, or click Ads delivered to see the average total number of ads delivered.

segment.source: Ad provider fill rates
segment.target: Ad provider fill rates

segment.source: The Ad provider fill rates chart shows the average fill rate of each of your ad networks over the selected period of time.
segment.target: The Ad provider fill rates chart shows the average fill rate of each of your ad networks over the selected period of time.

segment.source: Info for each ad network is shown together to help you compare each ad network's performance.
segment.target: Info for each ad network is shown together to help you compare each ad network's performance.

segment.source: Unique users per mediation configuration
segment.target: Unique users per mediation configuration

segment.source: The Unique users per mediation configuration chart shows the total number of unique users who received each version of your mediation configuration over the selected period of time.
segment.target: The Unique users per mediation configuration chart shows the total number of unique users who received each version of your mediation configuration over the selected period of time.

segment.source: Errors by ad network
segment.target: Errors by ad network

segment.source: The Errors by ad network chart shows the total number of requests and errors for each of your ad networks, along with the percentage of requests that resulted in an error.
segment.target: The Errors by ad network chart shows the total number of requests and errors for each of your ad networks, along with the percentage of requests that resulted in an error.

segment.source: Errors by type
segment.target: Errors by type

segment.source: The Errors by type chart shows the specific errors experienced by each ad network.
segment.target: The Errors by type chart shows the specific errors experienced by each ad network.

segment.source: It also shows the percentage of total errors for that network that a specific error represents, so you can get an idea of which errors are coming up frequently per ad network.
segment.target: It also shows the percentage of total errors for that network that a specific error represents, so you can get an idea of which errors are coming up frequently per ad network.
